languages.text: С астропатической станции VX-02-537 исходит психический вопль, сводящий астропатов с ума. Заккари Вайс просит Лорд-капитана нанести визит на станцию и заглушить этот крик, чтобы хор мог связаться с мирами династии.

traits.locale_text: С астропатической станции VX-02-537 транслируется необычное послание. Заккари Вайс полагает, что это может быть чем-то важным.

languages.text: A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.
languages.original_text: С астропатической станции VX-02-537 исходит психический вопль, сводящий астропатов с ума. Заккари Вайс просит Лорд-капитана нанести визит на станцию и заглушить этот крик, чтобы хор мог связаться с мирами династии.

traits.locale_text: A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.
An alarming message has been received from Astropathic Station VX-02-537. Zacchary Weisz is asking the Lord Captain to visit the station.

A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.

A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.

A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.

languages.text: Un grito psíquico proviene de la estación de Astrópatas VX-02-537 y está haciendo enloquecer a los Astrópatas de la nave. El maestro de coro Weisz pide a su Lord Capitán que visite la estación y haga callar el grito para que el coro pueda contactar con los mundos de la dinastía.
languages.original_text: A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.

traits.locale_text: Un grito psíquico proviene de la estación de Astrópatas VX-02-537 y está haciendo enloquecer a los Astrópatas de la nave. El maestro de coro Weisz pide a su Lord Capitán que visite la estación y haga callar el grito para que el coro pueda contactar con los mundos de la dinastía.

languages.text: 感応通信官ステーションVX-02-537からサイキックの悲鳴が届き、船の感応通信官を狂気へと陥らせる。クワイアーマスターのワイズは、合唱団が王朝の惑星と連絡を取るために、ロード・キャプテンにステーションに行って悲鳴を止めてほしいと願い出た。
languages.original_text: A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.

traits.locale_text: 感応通信官ステーションVX-02-537からサイキックの悲鳴が届き、船の感応通信官を狂気へと陥らせる。クワイアーマスターのワイズは、合唱団が王朝の惑星と連絡を取るために、ロード・キャプテンにステーションに行って悲鳴を止めてほしいと願い出た。

languages.text: 星语者星站VX-02-537传来了灵能的尖啸声，听到尖啸声的星语者全都发了疯。唱诗大师威茨希望行商浪人能前往这座星站，让尖啸声安静下来。只有这样，星语唱诗班才能恢复与王朝众多世界的联系。
languages.original_text: A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.

traits.locale_text: 星语者星站VX-02-537传来了灵能的尖啸声，听到尖啸声的星语者全都发了疯。唱诗大师威茨希望行商浪人能前往这座星站，让尖啸声安静下来。只有这样，星语唱诗班才能恢复与王朝众多世界的联系。

languages.text: Ein psionischer Schrei aus der astropathischen Station VX-02-537 treibt die Astropathen des Schiffs in den Wahnsinn. Chormeister Weisz hat den Lord Captain gebeten, die Station zu besuchen und den Schrei verstummen zu lassen, damit der Chor die Welten der Dynastie kontaktieren kann.
languages.original_text: A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.

traits.locale_text: Ein psionischer Schrei aus der astropathischen Station VX-02-537 treibt die Astropathen des Schiffs in den Wahnsinn. Chormeister Weisz hat den Lord Captain gebeten, die Station zu besuchen und den Schrei verstummen zu lassen, damit der Chor die Welten der Dynastie kontaktieren kann.

languages.text: Un cri psychique en provenance de la station astropathique VX-02-537 compromet la santé mentale des astropathes du vaisseau. Le maître de chœur Weisz a demandé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} de se rendre sur place et de le faire taire de manière à rétablir la communication avec les mondes de la dynastie.
languages.original_text: A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.

traits.locale_text: Un cri psychique en provenance de la station astropathique VX-02-537 compromet la santé mentale des astropathes du vaisseau. Le maître de chœur Weisz a demandé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} de se rendre sur place et de le faire taire de manière à rétablir la communication avec les mondes de la dynastie.

languages.text: VX-02-537 Astropatik İstasyonu'ndan bir ruhsezi çığlığı yükseliyor ve geminin Astropatlarını çıldırtıyor. Koro'nun hanedanlık dünyalarıyla iletişime geçebilmesi için Koro Şefi Weisz, Lord Kaptan'dan istasyonu ziyaret etmesini ve çığlığı susturmasını rica etti.
languages.original_text: A psychic scream is coming from Astropathic Station VX-02-537, driving the ship's Astropaths mad. Choirmaster Weisz has asked the Lord Captain to visit the station and silence the scream so that the Choir may contact the dynasty's worlds.
